title: IMS LD-Based Customized E-Course Design and Automatic Generation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Flexible instructional support system for professional learners accustomed to digital device environments

learning_goals: Learners can automatically generate IMS LD-compliant E-Courses using ELIDL-based templates.
Learners can apply six or more diverse instructional strategies (e.g., collaborative learning, problem-based learning) in digital environments.
Learners can design and evaluate customized educational content by linking ontology-based learning objectives with IMS content packages.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
